title: How Animals Sleep
description: Animals, just like people, need sleep. But the animals in this book don't sleep in a bed with a pillow as we do! They have all different types of sleeping habits that help them stay safe. Some will make you laugh, and others may surprise you.
highFrequencyWords: awake, brain, ceiling, glide, sleep, surface
